rows.name: slider_par_1_1
rows.parameter_list: help: any text for help tooltip

rows.name: slider_par_2_1
rows.parameter_list: title: any text as a title

rows.name: slider_par_3_1
rows.comments: any numbers as min and max values; number 5 is selected as the minimum value and number 8 is selected as the maximum value. min should be less than max.

rows.name: slider_par_4_1
rows.comments: A string below the minimum value

rows.name: slider_par_4_2
rows.comments: A sting below the maximum value

rows.name: slider_par_4_3
rows.parameter_list: min_value_label: minimum label; max_value_label: maximum label
rows.comments: A string below both minimum and maximum values

rows.name: slider_par_5_1
rows.comments: a number as a step size. This number needs to divide (max - min)

rows.name: slider_par_5_2
rows.comments: a number as a step size. This number needs to divide (max - min)

rows.name: slider_par_6_1
rows.comments: a number as the number of labels to show. This labels count minus 1 needs to divide (max - min). Selection of labels in between is possible/can be done.

rows.name: slider_par_6_2
rows.comments: a number as the number of labels to show. This labels count minus 1 needs to divide (max - min). Selection of labels in between is possible/can be done.

rows.name: slider_par_7_1
rows.comments: Not working, not used. Same as the default.

rows.name: slider_par_7_2
rows.comments: Not working, not used. Same as the default.

rows.name: slider_par_7_3
rows.comments: Not working, not used. Same as the default.

rows.name: slider_par_7_4
rows.comments: Not working, not used. Same as the default.
